wikipedia_page.main: Christine Blower, Baroness Blower (born 20 April 1951) was the eleventh General Secretary of the National Union of Teachers, a trade union representing qualified teachers across England and Wales. In March 2018, she stood for election and was shortlisted for the position of the Labour Party's General Secretary. She is the Vice Chair of the pressure group Unite Against Fascism.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: He became deputy General Secretary of the NUT in 2010. He became acting-leader of the NUT in May 2016 when Christine Blower stepped down as general secretary.
* Christine Blower, to be Baroness Blower, of Starch Green in the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
